title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Japanese High School Geography through Regional Development and Geospatial Concept Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geographic concepts (regional characteristics, spatial analysis) and understanding of Japanese social structures
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Apply core geographical concepts—local plasticity, resilience, and spatial scale—to regional development cases
Analyze factors shaping regional identity and propose solutions for resolving inter-regional conflicts
Visualize regional change processes using worksheets and propose future development strategies
Write a report connecting regional characteristics with value systems based on field survey data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
